episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4001_100:
I see a shadow of the person who will make the
Legendary Pokémon appear...
I believe that person is me!
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4002_100:
Wow, Silver! You and Ho-Oh have gotten so much
stronger together!
Hmph. You haven’t seen anything yet.
The Pokémon I longed for is so close to me, but...
I guess I just haven’t trained enough yet.
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4003_100:
No, you’re right—I really shouldn’t overdo it.
I think I’ll call it a day.

Thanks so much for sticking with me through all of
this, everyone.
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4005_100: I hope Silver’s around here somewhere...

C’mon, Silver. Everyone else wants to battle
against Ho-Oh, too!

It’s such a strong and beautiful Pokémon. It’s even
spoken of in myths!

As Pokémon Trainers, of course we want to
battle it!

Please! We just want you to show us how
it behaves in battle!
Hmph... Just listen to you all prattle on...
Why is everyone from Johto always like this?
Hey there! I’m glad I found you, Silver!
I’ve got something I wanted to return to you.
Yeah, I figured it must belong to Silver’s Ho-Oh.
No... That’s not from my Ho-Oh.
Really? Then where did this feather come from?
See, what do you think? Isn’t it amazing?!
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4006_100: Oh wow... I wish I had a Ho-Oh feather...
I know, right?

In Johto, it’s said that if you have one of these
feathers, you’ll be able to meet Ho-Oh!
Where exactly did you find such a precious thing?
Huh?! Umm... That’s a secret.
Anyway, uh, bye!
Hey, do you have a second?

That’s a Ho-Oh feather you’ve got, right? Could
you please show it to us, too?
Wh-what do you want?

Oh, sorry for popping up so suddenly. We didn’t
mean to startle you.
Yeah...that’s definitely not from my Ho-Oh.

So maybe it’s really a feather from a
different Pokémon.

H-hey, don’t just come up to me and start saying
stuff like that!
I swear, this is definitely a Ho-Oh feather!
Probably! I mean...I think...
If that really is a Ho-Oh feather...
and it’s not from Silver’s Ho-Oh...
Then maybe a different Ho-Oh has come to Pasio!
You really think so?
Another Ho-Oh on Pasio...

It’s said that Legendary Pokémon will appear to
the truly powerful Trainers.
If there’s even a chance, then I have to try!

I’ve just got to set my mind to it and go searching
for Ho-Oh!
And I’ll help you!
Let’s all find Ho-Oh together!
Thank you both so much!
I’ll pass.
Huh? You won’t come along with us?

The feather that girl had just now... There was
something really suspicious about it.

You can believe her if you want and go search
for Ho-Oh. But don’t get me involved.
I think...I agree with Silver.

I’d like to do a little digging and see if what we
just saw really was a Ho-Oh feather.
You, too, Kris?
Sorry I can’t go with you.
I’ll let you know if I find anything out!

It looks like both of them want to be a bit more
cautious about this.
I was hoping they’d come along, but... Oh well.

It’s fine. In fact, we may get even more
information by splitting up like this.
So let’s do our part and start looking for Ho-Oh!
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4007_100: Yes... That’s definitely the girl from before.
What, you’re not going to buy something?
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4008_100:
You found the Ho-Oh feather somewhere around
here, right?
Yes... I found it shining in the dark.
At first, I could hardly believe it.

That I actually had a Ho-Oh feather in my
own hand...
You’ve wanted to meet Ho-Oh that badly?

Not just Ho-Oh—all of the Legendary Pokémon
in the Johto region. But yes.

Legendary Pokémon will appear to
truly powerful Trainers.

That’s a saying that’s been passed down in
Ecruteak City.

I believe those words are true, and since the
moment I was born, I’ve been training in secret.

Thanks to that training, I can see things that others
can’t see, but...
that training hasn’t been easy.
Have you ever felt like it’s just too hard?
If I’m honest with you, yes, lots of times.

But thanks to my Ghost-type Pokémon always
sticking with me...

the training’s become a really good memory, not
just hardship.

Although, saying it like that makes it sound like it’s
all in the past, when actually my training is
still ongoing.

And I’ll keep it up until I discover a new future
for me.
Wow, that’s impressive...
Let’s do this, Morty! We’ll find Ho-Oh for sure!
Yes! I certainly intend to!
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4009_100:
I’ll have to see it again to be sure, but I think
that was...

Thanks for the reference materials about Ho-Oh,
Professor! They were really helpful!

I’m glad to hear it! Feel free to come back anytime
if you need anything.
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4010_100: Oh, Silver! And you from before!

I’m so glad I found you! There’s something I
wanted to ask...

It seems like you’ve discovered something as well.
Let’s compare notes.
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4011_100: We didn’t find a single clue...

I know—it’s so frustrating! We’ve been searching
high and low!

Well, that’s the way it goes sometimes. It’s not a
Pokémon that can be found so easily.
By the way, what’s all the commotion about?
I’m the one who’s gonna find Ho-Oh!

Don’t make me laugh! There’s no possible way you
could do it!

I already told you both—Ho-Oh is going to
become MY partner Pokémon!
Wh-what’s going on?
Every one of them has a Ho-Oh feather!

Even though we searched so hard and couldn’t find
a single one!
Something’s definitely strange here.
Silver and Kris may have been right after all...
It certainly looks that way.
About that Ho-Oh feather she had...

It was a fake—a feather taken from a different
bird Pokémon and dyed.
Whaaa?! A fake?!
Now tell them where you got that feather.
I, uh... Actually...I bought it from Team Rocket.
T-Team Rocket?!
I didn’t know it was a fake...

It was really expensive, but I spent all the cash I
had on it because I thought I’d be able to
meet Ho-Oh...

I see... So Team Rocket’s been selling fake
Ho-Oh feathers...
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4012_100:
If Team Rocket is selling fake Ho-Oh feathers,
does that mean...
All of those people have been tricked as well?!
Right, then. Let’s find the people who did this.

Let’s catch them right away and put a stop to
all this!

All those people truly believe that their feathers
are genuine...

Toying with their trusting hearts and stomping on
their dreams and aspirations...
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4013_100:
Oh! How about you? Wouldn’t you like one of
these Ho-Oh feathers?

Right now, they’re going for just one million
apiece! Great deal, don’t you think?

Ah... So you’re the ones selling the fake
Ho-Oh feathers.

Hmph. If he’s on to us, there’s only one thing we
can do!

The trusting hearts of humans, as well as their
dreams and aspirations... These things are worthy
of respect.

I won’t just stand by and let you trample all over
those precious thoughts and feelings!

Promise me now that you’ll never deceive people
like that again.

What’re you talkin’ about? It’s easy money. Why
would we ever give that up?

Then I suppose I’ll have to drive this lesson a little
further home.

It looks like those fakes of yours were actually of
some use.

We can’t keep selling these if someone here’s
actually partnered with the real thing!
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4014_100: That wasn’t like you at all.

You’re right... I may have gotten a bit
carried away.

Was it because of Ho-Oh? Or because you
couldn’t stand what Team Rocket was doing?

We took care of the other Team Rocket members
selling fake Ho-Oh feathers, too!

That guy from the International Police told us to
leave the rest to him.

They say Ho-Oh will reveal itself before a
pure-hearted Trainer, right?

I’m sure it’s watching you from somewhere, Morty,
and seeing your pure and strong feelings!

I think I’ll keep the feather I found yesterday as
a memento.

So I never forget my determination to
meet Ho-Oh!
episode_event_ch0148_10_matsuba/4015_110:
A few days later, as Morty began his
usual training...
